title: Gateway to adventure
creator_credit: Rayant Pictures, Anthony Gilkison and Darcy Conyers
brief_description: A lively impression of the variety and adventure which characterises the training of Naval Officer Cadets at the renowned Britannia Royal Naval College, Dartmouth. Includes exercises on land, at sea and in the air; mock engagement between a ship at the Dartmouth Squadron and an “enemy” submarine, and a passing-out parade, with all its attendant ceremonial, held in the presence of Admiral of the Fleet, the Earl Mountbatten of Burma.
